Possession of a visa does not entitle the bearer to enter the United States if at the time he seeks to enter he is found to be inadmissible. Upon arrival in the United States, it must be surrendered to a United States Immigration Officer. IMMIGRANT CLASSIFICATION CONSULATE GENERAL CLASSIFICATION SYMBOL AMERICAN MONTERREY, N.
